data.title: Ricky Dale Brown Obituary 2024
data.meta_description: Ricky Dale Brown, age 65, of Bethpage, TN, passed away February 14, 2024.  He was born February 4, 1959 in Gallatin, TN to "Pete" Earl Brown and Margie Beasley Brown.He was prec...
data.text:
Ricky Dale Brown, age 65, of Bethpage, TN, passed away February 14, 2024. He was born February 4, 1959 in Gallatin, TN to "Pete" Earl Brown and Margie Beasley Brown.

He was preceded in death by his father, Pete Brown; and his grandparents, Herbert and Mary Brown and Howard and Verna Beasley.

He is survived by his children, Kelly Brown, Maria Brown (Beau Gregory), Jessica (P.J.) Augustus, and Kasey Brown; his mother, Margie Brown; his grandchildren, Ian Harper, Madison (Blaze) Underwood, Tyler Gregory, Morgan Gregory, Kaylee Mai, A.J., Jackson, Leeson and Oaklynn; his great grandchildren, Draven, Ryder and a future great grandson; his sisters, Rita (David) Sherrill and Gina (Roger) Foley; his brothers, Randy (Angela) Brown and Rex (Teresa) Brown; as well as his uncle, Clarence Brown.

Funeral services for Mr. Brown will be conducted on Sunday, February 18th, 2024 at 2PM from the chapel of Woodard Funeral Home with interment to follow in the Fairfield Cemetery. The family will receive visitors on Saturday, February 17th from 10AM till 8PM and again on Sunday, February 18th from 9AM till service time at 2PM at Woodard Funeral Home.

In lieu of flowers the family request you make donations to the funeral expenses at Woodard Funeral Home.
